title: Shooting of Hadi: Key aide of Faisal held
body: Rab-11 has arrested another suspect in the case filed over the attempted murder of Sharif Osman Hadi. The detainee, identified as Kabir alias Dhatbhanga Kabir, 30, was picked up from Narayanganj's Fatullah area on Monday night. Originally from Patuakhali, Kabir had been living in Dhaka's Adabar. Rab officials said Kabir went into hiding in Fatullah's Boktaboli area after the shooting incident. Lt Commander Naeem Ul Haque of Rab-11 told The Daily Star that Kabir was detained around 5:00am and later handed over to the Detective Branch (DB) of Dhaka Metropolitan Police on Monday night after interrogation. Rab Media Wing Headquarters Wing Commander MZM Enthekhab Chowdhury confirmed the arrest to The Daily Star on Monday night, saying Kabir was detained as a suspected associate directly linked to the attack. CCTV footage revealed that Faisal entered the Inqilab Cultural Centre with three others on December 4, where he was seen speaking with Hadi. The footage further shows Faisal attending a meeting with Hadi at the same venue on December 9. The footage identifies Kabir as one of the men who accompanied Faisal to the Inqilab Cultural Centre on December 4. Previously, Rab detained Faisal's wife Samia, his friend Monika, and his brother-in-law Shipu, in connection with the shooting of Hadi.
